Author: GMF1089
Text: Nikki has struggled with anorexia for years and years. She was known as the anorexic girl in college. She nearly died. She has explained that she said what she said because she was projecting and also very jealous of Taylor and her body. Nikki has spoken very openly about her eating disorder and how it impacted her mental health, friendships, and family. Was it shitty that she said something about Taylor? Yeah. But she owned the fact that her own ED brain was doing the driving when it happened.
